original_text: For it is not those who hear the law who are righteous in God’s sight, but it is those who obey the law who will be declared righteous.
korean_text: 하나님 앞에서는 율법을 듣는 자가 의인이 아니요 오직 율법을 행하는 자라야 의롭다 하심을 얻으리니

sentences.original_text: For it is not those who hear the law
sentences.korean_translation: 율법을 듣는 자들이 의로운 것이 아니라

sentences.original_text: who are righteous in God's sight
but it is those who obey the law
